name: Spearit Bear – “My Eyes” Music NFT
description:
This NFT comes with a downloadable file of Spearit Bear's song "My Eyes" Purchase of this NFT transfers ownership of the digital file and image, not the right to ownership of the music itself. Commercial use of the image or the music file, aside from the resale of this NFT, must be requested and approved by Spearit Bear beforehand. This song was first released on streaming platforms in 2021 but is now exclusively available here.
Original Beat by Kix Beats (@kix_beats on TikTok)
This song was written at a time when the world had one major news story after another and it seemed like there was no light at the end of the tunnel. Every time Spearit Bear opened their eyes they felt like they were seeing more sadness, hunger, death, and destruction. And in those moments the inspiration came for this song to help uplift others who may feel the same and remind you that everything needed will be provided as long as you keep pushing forward.
This music NFT qualifies as one that can be collected to add to the 5 total needed for a collector to be considered a 'Distributor' and receive monthly Distributor pool payments from secondary sale royalties. More info at spearitbear.com/nfts
